---
# UCLA thesis fields
title: "Dissertation Title"
author: "Author"
degree_year: "Degree Year"
degree_month: "Degree Month"
defense_year: "Defense Year"
defense_month: "Defense Month"
program: "Program"
uc_campus: "Los Angeles"
report: "Dissertation"
degree: "Doctor of Philosphy"
chair: "Professor Chair"
signature1: "Professor Committee Member 1"
signature2: "Professor Committee Member 2"
signature3: "Professor Committee Member 3"
abstract: "Abstract"
acknowledgments: "Thanks everyone!"
dedication: "To you"
# End of UCLA thesis fields
knit: "bookdown::render_book"
site: bookdown::bookdown_site
output: 
  bruindown::thesis_pdf:
    latex_engine: xelatex
  # bruindown::thesis_gitbook: default
  # bruindown::thesis_word: default
  # bruindown::thesis_epub: default
bibliography: bib/thesis.bib # Put your bibliography file in the bib folder
csl: csl/ieee-with-url.csl # Keep your specific csl file in the csl folder
link-citations: yes
linkcolor: blue
citecolor: blue
urlcolor: blue
lot: true # create list of tables
lof: true # create list of figures
# space_between_paragraphs: true
# Delete the # at the beginning of the previous line if you'd like to have a 
# blank new line between each paragraph

# Include LaTeX packages here:
header-includes:
- \usepackage{amsthm}
---

```{r include_packages, include = FALSE}
# This chunk ensures that the bruindown package is installed and loaded. This
# bruindown package includes the template files for the thesis.
if(!require(devtools))
  install.packages("devtools", repos = "http://cran.rstudio.com")
if(!require(bruindown))
  devtools::install_github("emjcampos/bruindown")
library(bruindown)
```
